title: Assur Archive 31
description: In a chamber of House 5 (dA6II), situated where "Ost Strasse" forks into two lanes, excavators found a small archive of 15 nearly complete and several fragmentary clay tablets. One fragmentary text seems to be a purchase document concerning the acquisition of a woman.

properties.description: Representative locations of the Neo-Assyrian archive at Assur on the basis of Peders√©n 1987 Plan(s) 62.
properties.title: Plan location of Assur Archive 31
